column5: Hi all,  It was  'PD' day at school on Friday so I promised my kid we would go to Lac Seul. he was so pumped all week he told a bunch of kids at his school where he was going. One of the kids told his dad he wanted to go too and his dad texted me and so the plan was born. Turns out John knows this part of Lac Seul like the back of his hand so we exchanged a few spots between us. Jack and Zack had a great time too. Fish were still really shallow, between 2' and 7' FOW. Got to play with the drone too, some nice shots of our shore lunch spot of 'Secret Island'.
Living the dream with your boy. Gotta love it.
Fantastic stuff there Simon  Your videos are great. and Jack sure is growing  Cheers Rick
Very nice Simon and Jack!  I love how you included the leeches bit and some discipline ????  Looks like a great day on the water!
Awesome video and the area looks so peaceful.
